meanings.sent1: Some people can be real fatheads and make silly decisions.
meanings.sent2: Don't listen to that fathead, they don't know what they're talking about.
meanings.sent3: The fathead thought it was a good idea to wear socks with sandals.
meanings.sent4: His stubbornness made him a fathead, unable to see reason.
meanings.sent5: The classroom clown always acts like a fathead to get attention.

meanings.definition: A person with a large or bloated head.
meanings.sent1: The baby in the picture had chubby cheeks and a fathead.
meanings.sent2: The cartoon character had a comically oversized fathead.
meanings.sent3: The balloon animal artist made a fathead balloon sculpture.
meanings.sent4: His ego was so big, it was like he had a fathead on his shoulders.
meanings.sent5: The mascot costume had a huge fathead that bobbed as he danced.

meanings.definition: A person who is arrogant or conceited.
meanings.sent1: She always acts like a fathead, thinking she's better than everyone else.
meanings.sent2: The fathead strutted around the office like they owned the place.
meanings.sent3: The fathead refused to admit they were wrong, even when proven otherwise.
meanings.sent4: His fathead attitude made it hard for others to work with him.
meanings.sent5: The celebrity's fathead behavior turned off many of their fans.
